name: U.F.O - Tank Hunter
description:
Welcome to the ultimate alien invasion game - U.F.O Tank Hunter!

In this thrilling adventure, you take control of a powerful U.F.O and battle against waves of tanks and rockets that seek to destroy you. Your mission is to survive the onslaught of enemies by dodging bullets and blasting tanks with your deadly weapons.

With a shield to protect you from enemy fire, and a special double beam cannon attack that can take down even the toughest tanks, you'll need all your skills to survive. But don't worry - you can collect plutonium bars dropped by defeated tanks to repair your ship or upgrade your weapons, giving you an edge over the competition.

U.F.O Tank Hunter is an intense, action-packed game that will test your skills and reflexes. So what are you waiting for? Get ready to take to the skies and show those tanks who's boss in U.F.O Tank Hunter!
